title: Gemstone + Icons from Blue Essence store.
body:
Apparently there are icons available for purchase in the BE store that come with gemstones. However upon purchasing one of them a while back I had only received the icon and my gemstone counter hadn't changed.
Am I supposed to wait for it to appear?

replies.body:
That gemstone was already added, no worries! 

You had 3 before purchasing that icon on the 15th, and as soon as you bought the icon the gemstone was added to bring you up to 4 total.
